mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message (fromUserName, toUserName, content, create_date) VALUES (#{fromUserName}, #{toUserName}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, fromUserName, toUserName, content, create_date FROM chat_message WHERE (fromUserName = #{fromUserName} AND toUserName = #{toUserName}) OR (fromUserName = #{toUserName} AND toUserName = #{fromUserName}) ORDER BY create_date ASC
